name: Squirbania
description: In this sequel to Squirble Jump, you continue to play as Squirble the squirrel. You navigate a castle fighting enemies and bosses while finding upgrades to aid you, with the end goal of defeating the evil "Bapula," who has stolen the legendary lemon from you and the old squirrel. Shoot eggs at evil lil' Gooblers and Smogglers. This is the DEMO so far, so there will be more to come. Have fun!
